title: Chao Mini Zhanshi season4
title_japanese: 超迷你战士 第四季
synopsis: Is it difficult to reject others? Have you ever received a gift that could not be refused? The brave super-mini warrior received a gift from the troubled star boss, the queen, this terrible gift actually made the super-mini warrior lose his fighting ability! At the critical moment, the red-haired little emperor showed up with his brother to express the baby. Can these happy friends work together to defeat the ensuing troubles with happiness and courage? Life needs more positive energy! Call now~Super Mini Warrior! (translated from qq)
